name: detect_center_line_and_save
description:
After warping an image, thresholds the orange line via HSV, performs morphological closing and skeletonization, uniformly samples a specified number of centerline points, saves them to a targets file, and calls trace_targets to overlay and display those sampled points. 

Example Usage: 'detect_center_line_and_save(image_path='Data/frame_img.png', num_points=40.0)'

image_path.description: Path to the warped input image file.

num_points.description: Number of centerline points to sample along the skeleton.
